body: At 4th level, a cave druid gains a +2 bonus on saves against exceptional, supernatural, and spell-like abilities of oozes and aberrations. This ability replaces resist nature's lure.
name: Resist Subterranean Corruption
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Cave Druid/Resist Subterranean Corruption
